title: Issue with skin choices
body:
All skins bellow are new and not wanted or needed

{{champion:201}}  last skin. 23-Aug-2018

{{champion:28}}  3 skins 2018. 2 skins on 03-Nov-2018

{{champion:115}}  last skin. 12-Sep-2018

{{champion:8}}  last skin. 31-May-2018

{{champion:16}}  last skins. 21-Nov-2018,06-Dec-2018

{{champion:64}}  lats skin. 14-Jun-2018

{{champion:43}}  last skin, 13-Jun-2019 6 months ago???

only skin out of this set that was needed was Zillian

{{champion:16}}  4 skins within 1 year {{champion:84}}  4 skins within 1 year. {{champion:516}} has still yet to receive a skin since his release over 2 years ago. Their are many many of champions that have gone 3+ years without a skin 2 events. {{champion:516}} could have gotten one but got pushed aside for Elder wood {{champion:103}} and ficking {{champion:16}}.

It does not matter if a champion is liked or popular microtransactions for skins SHOULD be equal, especially because of how many champions they have. If you cant support a player base while making money, you're doing completely wrong. Actually insane how dumb riot have been with skins the last 3 years,
